title: Split Order into Multiple Shipments
description: A customer's order contains one item that is on backorder. The agent needs to ship the in-stock items now and the backordered item later.

tasks.description: Identify the order containing both in-stock and backordered items.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the order and confirms the stock status of each item.

tasks.description: Split the order into two separate shipments in the order management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates two shipment records from the single order.

tasks.description: Process the shipment for the in-stock items immediately.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a shipping label for the first part of the order.
